var H = 0.5;
var N = 1 / 3;
var M = 2 / 3; //  Tile ID to Slope defs.
//  First 4 elements = line data, final = solid or non-solid behind the line

module.exports = {
  2: [0, 1, 1, 0, true],
  3: [0, 1, 1, H, true],
  4: [0, H, 1, 0, true],
  5: [0, 1, 1, M, true],
  6: [0, M, 1, N, true],
  7: [0, N, 1, 0, true],
  8: [H, 1, 0, 0, true],
  9: [1, 0, H, 1, true],
  10: [H, 1, 1, 0, true],
  11: [0, 0, H, 1, true],
  12: [0, 0, 1, 0, false],
  13: [1, 1, 0, 0, true],
  14: [1, H, 0, 0, true],
  15: [1, 1, 0, H, true],
  16: [1, N, 0, 0, true],
  17: [1, M, 0, N, true],
  18: [1, 1, 0, M, true],
  19: [1, 1, H, 0, true],
  20: [H, 0, 0, 1, true],
  21: [0, 1, H, 0, true],
  22: [H, 0, 1, 1, true],
  23: [1, 1, 0, 1, false],
  24: [0, 0, 1, 1, true],
  25: [0, 0, 1, H, true],
  26: [0, H, 1, 1, true],
  27: [0, 0, 1, N, true],
  28: [0, N, 1, M, true],
  29: [0, M, 1, 1, true],
  30: [N, 1, 0, 0, true],
  31: [1, 0, M, 1, true],
  32: [M, 1, 1, 0, true],
  33: [0, 0, N, 1, true],
  34: [1, 0, 1, 1, false],
  35: [1, 0, 0, 1, true],
  36: [1, H, 0, 1, true],
  37: [1, 0, 0, H, true],
  38: [1, M, 0, 1, true],
  39: [1, N, 0, M, true],
  40: [1, 0, 0, N, true],
  41: [M, 1, N, 0, true],
  42: [M, 0, N, 1, true],
  43: [N, 1, M, 0, true],
  44: [N, 0, M, 1, true],
  45: [0, 1, 0, 0, false],
  52: [1, 1, M, 0, true],
  53: [N, 0, 0, 1, true],
  54: [0, 1, N, 0, true],
  55: [M, 0, 1, 1, true]
};
